case.name: Phosphate Resources Limited v Turnbull, Minister for the Environment and Water Resources [2007] FCA 1507 (27 September 2007)

citances.sentence: 13 The proceedings were commenced by application and statement of claim. However, the respondent successfully resisted PRL's proposal that the proceedings should continue on the pleadings. Instead French J decided on 27 September 2007, in accordance with the respondent's desires, that 'the matter should proceed by way of affidavit and written submissions' ( Phosphate Resources Limited v Turnbull, Minister for Environment and Water Resources [2007] FCA 1507 at [10] ).
